entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:27 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain or freezing rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain mixed with freezing rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with freezing rain early in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 80 in the morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
